item.title: Hugo with Staticman Commenting and Subscriptions
item.description: Adding Staticman commenting system to BinaryMist blog and Hugo Academic

item.title: BinaryMist Web Migration
item.description: In this post we discuss the move from the legacy BinaryMist blog on Wordpress.com, along with the BinaryMist website, to a single static site on the Hugo platform hosted on Github Pages.
